Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP48.client.GUI.sceneControllers

Class GameBoardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP48.client.GUI.sceneControllers.GameBoardController
public class GameBoardController
extends java.lang.Object
class used as a controller for the board, used to update it and modify its status

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    GameBoardController​(GUI view)
    class constructor, initialising the reference to the gui object

    support method to check if a certain position on the board has already been highlighted

    Helper method to complete player's action, dependently to tha completed actions; invokes some helper methods to notify the game controller of the action, or to request the player to complete the second part of some action.

      class constructor, initialising the reference to the gui object

  • Method Details

    • requestDivinitySelection

      public void requestDivinitySelection​(java.util.ArrayList<DivinitiesWithDescription> availableDivinities)
      Loads and makes visible divinities selector controller, in order to request player to select his own divinity
      Parameters:
      availableDivinities - the list of available divinities to choose

    • sendChallengerDivinities

      public void sendChallengerDivinities​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> divinities)
      Notifies the game controller that challenger selected the available divinities in the game
      Parameters:
      divinities - the chosen divinities

    • sendPlayerDivinity

      public void sendPlayerDivinity​(java.lang.String divinity)
      Notifies the game controller of the divinity chosen by the player
      Parameters:
      divinity - the chosen divinities

    • sendFirstPlayerChoice

      public void sendFirstPlayerChoice​(java.lang.String playerName)
      Notifies the game controller that the challenger chosen the first player of the game
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the first player

    • requestInitialPositioning

      public void requestInitialPositioning​(java.util.ArrayList<Position> validCells)
      method implementing the positioning of the workers on the board
      Parameters:
      validCells - is the list of valid positions for the placing of the workers

    • sendInitialPositioningChoice

      public void sendInitialPositioningChoice​(Position initialPosition)
      method called by the initial positioning scene controller, to notify the server about the player choice
      Parameters:
      initialPosition - is the position chosen by the player

    • requestMove

      public void requestMove​(java.util.ArrayList<WorkerValidCells> validCellsForMove)
      method implementing the move action of a player during the match
      Parameters:
      validCellsForMove - is the list of workers that can be moved, together with the positions where they can be moved

    • postWorkerChoiceMove

      public void postWorkerChoiceMove​(WorkerValidCells chosenWorker)
      support method implementing the part of the move action where the player chooses the cell where to move
      Parameters:
      chosenWorker - is the worker selected to move, with the valid cells where he can be put on

    • sendMoveChoice

      public void sendMoveChoice​(ActionCoordinates moveChoiceCoordinates)
      method that notifies the observers about the worker and the cell chosen to move
      Parameters:
      moveChoiceCoordinates - contains the coordinates of the worker and of the cell

    • isAlreadyHighlighted

      public boolean isAlreadyHighlighted​(java.util.ArrayList<WorkerValidCells> listToCheck, Position posToCheck, int workerRow, int workerColumn)
      support method to check if a certain position on the board has already been highlighted
      Parameters:
      listToCheck - is the full list of workers with their valid positions
      posToCheck - is the position we need to check before highlighting it
      workerRow - is the row of the worker who has the position we are checking in his list
      workerColumn - is the column of the worker who has the position we are checking in his list
      Returns:
      a boolean which is true if the position has already been highlighted

    • requestDomeOrBuild

      public void requestDomeOrBuild​(java.util.ArrayList<WorkerValidCells> validForBuild, java.util.ArrayList<WorkerValidCells> validForDome)
      method handling the building actions during a player's turn
      Parameters:
      validForBuild - is the list of workers who can do the build, with their valid cells for this operation
      validForDome - is the list of workers who can do the dome, with their valid cells for this action

    • postWorkerChoiceBuild

      public void postWorkerChoiceBuild​(java.util.ArrayList<WorkerValidCells> buildWorker, java.util.ArrayList<WorkerValidCells> domeWorker)
      method implementing the part of the build action after the player has chosen the worker to use (if there is a choice)
      Parameters:
      buildWorker - contains the chosen worker with the list of cells where to build
      domeWorker - contains the chosen worker with the list of cells that can be domed

    • sendBuildChoice

      public void sendBuildChoice​(ActionCoordinates buildActionCoordinates)
      method used to notify the server about the build action coordinates
      Parameters:
      buildActionCoordinates - contains the chosen worker and the chosen cell to do the build

    • sendDomeChoice

      public void sendDomeChoice​(ActionCoordinates domeActionCoordinates)
      method used to notify the client observers about the dome action coordinates
      Parameters:
      domeActionCoordinates - contains the worker and the cell to do the dome action

    • requestOptionalMove

      public void requestOptionalMove​(java.util.ArrayList<WorkerValidCells> validCellsForMove)
      method handling the optional move action during a turn
      Parameters:
      validCellsForMove - is the list of valid cells for this action

    • requestOptionalBuild

      public void requestOptionalBuild​(java.util.ArrayList<WorkerValidCells> build, java.util.ArrayList<WorkerValidCells> dome)
      method handling the optional building actions of a player
      Parameters:
      build - is the list of valid cells for the build action
      dome - is the list of valid cells for the dome action

      public void changedPlayerList​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> newPlayerList)
      Updates the player list shown at video when it changed
      Parameters:
      newPlayerList - the new player-divinity association list

      Loads and makes visible the first player pane, to request the challenger to choose game's first player
      Parameters:
      players - the list of players in game

    • nextActionFSM

      public void nextActionFSM()
      Helper method to complete player's action, dependently to tha completed actions; invokes some helper methods to notify the game controller of the action, or to request the player to complete the second part of some action. Restores than the original board state.

    • changedBoard

      public void changedBoard​(java.util.ArrayList<Cell> newCells)
      Updates the board cells which content has changed
      Parameters:
      newCells - the cells that have been updated

      Gets the player workers' colour parsing the string arrived from the controller
      Parameters:
      playerName - the player name
      Returns:
      the player workers' colour
